item.title: ‘Best Boy’: Jesse Noah Klein Skewers the Patriarchal Nuclear Family in Jet-Black Québec Comedy Thriller
item.description: Director Jesse Noah Klein is world premiering at Edinburgh the jet-black comedy thriller “Best Boy,” starring Caroline Dhavernas and Aaron Abrams, (“Hannibal”), Marc Bendavid (“Good Witch”) and Lise R
